data: rear room | coal office | West Lake street | Chicago | square pine table
In the rear room of a small frame building, the front of which was occupied as a coal office, located on West Lake street, Chicago, three men were seated around a square pine table.
Jim Cummings; Or, The Great Adams Express Robbery
